section.newOrdersSubtitle: Orders after 4 PM, will be delivered next day.

badWeather.title: Bad Weather
badWeather.desc: Heavy rain, snow, or extreme heat can make roads unsafe or slow down delivery.

trafficJams.title: Traffic Jams
trafficJams.desc: Roadblocks or heavy traffic can cause significant delays.

vehicleProblems.title: Vehicle Problems
vehicleProblems.desc: A breakdown, flat tire, or running out of fuel can halt the delivery.

wrongAddress.title: Wrong Address
wrongAddress.desc: Incorrect or incomplete address details can prevent locating the customer.

accidents.title: Accidents or Injuries
accidents.desc: Personal accidents or sudden injuries while on duty can stop the delivery process.

orders.ongoingRequestsDescription: Track and manage your current delivery requests efficiently. Stay updated with real-time status and details for each order.

otpDialog.otpVerificationDescription: A 4 digit Delivery OTP code has been sent, Enter the code to complete Delivery.
